page.title: 05EAST LINTON CHILDREN'S HOMES
page.content: Out of a class of 22 children only 4 children live outside the village.Of the remaining children 5 live in a detached bungalow 1 lives in a detached house 4 live in a semi-detached house 4 live in a terraced house 4 live in a flat The average number of rooms in the houses is 9. Every house has a garden,a bathroom and an inside toilet.The average number of residents in each house is 4.5. The houses vary in age from 2 years on a new housing estate to 160 years, which is an old farmhouse. The 4 children from outside the village live in a terraced cottage, a farmhouse and 2 detached houses.
